entry.title: Bitcoin Testing Project
entry.summary: Steve informed via email that he was ready to proceed, requesting the recipient to check out the links he had previously sent. He also mentioned having over 400 test cases for eight different platforms, which included 50 release tests each. Steve wasn't sure about the meaning of the word "bless" and took it as a euphemism for pay. The recipient replied bluntly asking for the issues that Steve had uncovered during the testing process. However, they were unable to find any record of such issues under Steve's name or email in the issue tracker or email archives beyond abstract discussions about testing.
